item.title: Cellular_atomata
item.description: I invite you to google “Conway’s Game of Life.” You will be greeted with one of Google’s easter eggs in the form of some little white squares on the side of your screen showing how much nerds love

item.title: About Your Instructor
item.description:
Hello, my name is JD, and I will be your instructor for this introduction to python class! I am looking forward to meeting everyone and teaching my favorite programming language: python.

Where am I from?

I grew up in Clinton, Mississippi USA.

Download here: Download the ZIP file

item.title: hello, world
item.description:
Downloading python

Before we can jump into programing, everyone needs to download python. Download the latest version for your operating system from python.org (3.13.1 when I wrote this).

To test that your instilation was successful and you now have python on your PATH system variable, open your terminal and run the following command.
